text:
Steps Sourcing India (P) Ltd won Gully Kings 2016 trophy and Rs. 75,000 in the competition organised by Coimbatore ACME Round Table, recently.

Twenty-four teams participated in the event. Sivalingam of the winning team who scored 171 runs won the best batsman trophy, while Pradeep of the same team who bagged 16 wickets won the best bowler trophy. Rakindo Kovai Knights, who emerged runners-up and Dharani Motors, who came third won a cash prizes. .

Reunion

Students of the 1978-81 batch of Nachimuthu Polytechnic College recently had a family get-together. S. Udhayakumar, RTO of Coimbatore Central and an alumni, said that it was decided to have a reunion with their families on May 28 and 29 at Jenny Club.
title: TAMIL NADU
